news: Cipher Mining announced its Q3 2025 financial results, reporting $72M in revenue, a net loss of $3M, and non-GAAP adjusted earnings of $41M. The company highlighted two major corporate developments.
Cipher Mining announced participation in upcoming investor and industry conferences, signaling active investor engagement.
Cipher Mining stock declined 5.7%, underperforming the broader market, amid investor concerns over earnings uncertainty.
Cipher Mining surged 19.86%, driven by speculation of a strategic partnership with Google/Fluidstack for AI HPC workloads and strong Bitcoin mining results.
